Package game

Class GridClass

java.lang.Object
game.GridClass
public class GridClass extends Object
The GridClass manages and renders a grid structure for a game level using JavaFX. It utilizes a GraphicsContext for drawing, and can render images onto specific grid squares.

    • GridClass

      public GridClass()

  • Method Details

    • drawGrid

      public void drawGrid()
      Draws the grid on the canvas. This method iterates through the grid and draws each square.

    • clearGrid

      public void clearGrid()
      Clears the entire grid. This method clears the canvas, effectively resetting the visual representation of the grid.

    • getWidth

      public int getWidth()
      Retrieves the width of the grid in terms of number of squares.
      Returns:
      The width of the grid.

    • setWidth

      public void setWidth(int width)
      Sets the width of the grid in terms of number of squares.
      Parameters:
      width - The new width to set for the grid.

    • getHeight

      public int getHeight()
      Retrieves the height of the grid in terms of number of squares.
      Returns:
      The height of the grid.

    • setHeight

      public void setHeight(int height)
      Sets the height of the grid in terms of number of squares.
      Parameters:
      height - The new height to set for the grid.

    • getSquareSize

      public int getSquareSize()
      Retrieves the size of each square in the grid.
      Returns:
      The size of a single square in the grid.

    • setSquareSize

      public void setSquareSize(int squareSize)
      Sets the size of each square in the grid.
      Parameters:
      squareSize - The new size for each square in the grid.

    • getStateGrid

      public int[][] getStateGrid()
      Retrieves the state grid, a 2D array representing the state of each square in the grid.
      Returns:
      The current state grid.

    • setStateGrid

      public void setStateGrid(int[][] stateGrid)
      Sets the state grid, a 2D array representing the state of each square in the grid.
      Parameters:
      stateGrid - The new state grid to set.
